Tolles großzügiges Apartment.
Leider hat der Booking.vom Preis nicht mit dem vor Ort zu zahlenden zusammen gepasst und uns wurde mehr berechnet, trotz Vorlage der Buchungsbestätigung.
Die Zimmer sind sehr schön und die Lage war für uns auch gut. Es gibt eine riesige Auswahl an Essen das man sich aufs Zimmer bestellen kann.

Es steht nichts von einer Kaution (Bar oder Kreditkarte) die man beim Check-in bezahlen muss. Sie wird auch nicht nur reserviert sondern gebucht/abgezogen und falls alles passt storniert. Der Pool ist nicht beheizt und recht kühl. Bei schlechtem Wetter einfach viel zu kalt.

Super moderne stylisches Massionette Appartment in guter Lage. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Die Waschmaschine/Trockner und die Küchenzeile sind super (auch wenn die Messer stumpf sind). Das Bett ist sehr weich und bequem.

Es sieht alles super schön aus, ist aber oft unpraktisch. Die Badewanne im Zimmer ist zugleich Dusche und man flutet das jalbe Zimmer wenn man nicht absolut still steht (und bei der Duschbrause ging nur kaltes Wasser). In der oberen Etage hat man keine Ablageflächen für Kleidung, Buch, Handy, Brille etc. Evtl ein Nachtisch am Bett wäre praktisch.
Beim Einchecken unterschreibt man eine Inventarliste ohne das Zimmer gesehen zu haben.

Absolutely beautiful hotel. We had the duplex which made it feel homey vs a traditional hotel. the location was perfect and everything was within walking distance. The staff was very helpful and were good with communicating via WhatsApp

The biggest thing I did not like about the hotel was the inaccurate advertising for their rentals and their 19% credit card fee. We received flyers from the staff via WhatsApp about Vespa rentals for $45USD/day with a $50USD deposit. They did not honor their advertising and stated that the flyers were outdated. We were charged $50USD/day and they required a $300USD deposit which is absolutely insane because it was cash only. They do allow you to use your credit card for some things but be warned that they charge a 19% credit card fee which is the highest amount we were charged anywhere in Tulum. They also do not honor the value of the USD that they put at their front desk, so be aware of that.

My stay at Claro de Luna truly was like when you visit family you haven't seen in a while.  Roberto and his family operate a nice, quaint apartment complex that has units complete with everything you need for a long or short stay, in the heart of a normal neighborhood.  You're in a different country, and it's not a hotel- which is what makes staying at Claro de Luna so great.
You're in a different country, so you want to get acquainted and acclimated to the difference from being in your own home.  That's why having family with you is so important.  As a solo traveler, from the moment my shuttle arrived, Roberto greeted me warmly and indulged me though I arrived after typical operation hours.
What happens when you arrive at Claro de Luna, you're alone, you're a first-time visitor, and don't know much more than whatever research you thought to review beforehand?  Well, your Uncle Roberto has staff grab your luggage, everyone escorts you through the property's tall gates, through the white marble entryway of the residence complex, and he delicately attunes your present disposition within balance of a more relaxing nature.  He graciously subdues any non tranquil feelings and calmly explains where you are, what's around you and expounds or explains everything at your pace.
You get so comfortable and confident with being in Playa del Carmen because you suddenly begin moving about as if you have little to worry about because you're staying with your uncle's family.
On my first night, I arrived hungry and wanted some local food but only had a credit card, instead of local currency or cash.  Uncle Roberto gave me a brief tour or my apartment (including the beautifulpool I'd eventually have a good time in), left me to settle-in, and had a staff member call a taxicab to wait for me, while fronting me more than enough local currency to get whatever I needed for the evening.
